mapper.sql: id as id , status as status , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , hotInformation as hotInformation , informationSubContent as informationSubContent , informationContent as informationContent , hotCount as hotCount , areaId as areaId , hotdate as hotdate , htmlId as htmlId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_gkinformation_gkhot ( status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, hotInformation, informationSubContent, informationContent, hotCount, areaId, hotdate, htmlId ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{hotInformation}, #{informationSubContent}, #{informationContent}, #{hotCount}, #{areaId}, #{hotdate}, #{htmlId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_gkinformation_gkhot
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
hotInformation = #{hotInformation},
informationSubContent = #{informationSubContent},
informationContent = #{informationContent},
hotCount = #{hotCount},
areaId = #{areaId},
hotdate = #{hotdate},
htmlId = #{htmlId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_gkinformation_gkhot
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
hotInformation = #{map.hotInformation},
informationSubContent = #{map.informationSubContent},
informationContent = #{map.informationContent},
hotCount = #{map.hotCount},
areaId = #{map.areaId},
hotdate = #{map.hotdate},
htmlId = #{map.htmlId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_gkinformation_gkhot
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
AND hotInformation like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hotInformation} , '%')
AND informationSubContent like CONCAT('%', #{condition.informationSubContent} , '%')
AND informationContent like CONCAT('%', #{condition.informationContent} , '%')
AND hotCount like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hotCount} , '%')
AND areaId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.areaId} , '%')
AND hotdate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.hotdate} , '%')
AND htmlId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.htmlId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
